name: updateNetworkSwitchAlternateManagementInterface
description: Update the switch alternate management interface for the network

enabled.description: Boolean value to enable or disable AMI configuration. If enabled, VLAN and protocols must be set

protocols.description: Can be one or more of the following values: 'radius', 'snmp' or 'syslog'

switches.description: Array of switch serial number and IP assignment. If parameter is present, it cannot have empty body. Note: switches parameter is not applicable for template networks, in other words, do not put 'switches' in the body when updating template networks. Also, an empty 'switches' array will remove all previous assignments

alternateManagementIp.description: Switch alternative management IP. To remove a prior IP setting, provide an empty string

gateway.description: Switch gateway must be in IP format. Only and must be specified for Polaris switches

subnetMask.description: Switch subnet mask must be in IP format. Only and must be specified for Polaris switches

vlanId.description: Alternate management VLAN, must be between 1 and 4094
